Title: Coefficient of Drag
Plot: Vic challenges Shane and deals with threats to his family; a federal agent arrives in Farmington to investigate a recent wave of violence.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sexual themes
GuestStars: Laurie Holden, Michele Hicks, F.J. Rio, Anna Maria Horsford, Hector Luis Bustamante, Matt Corboy, Jos Viramontes, Necar Zadegan, Autumn Chiklis
